name: Yayoi Nanatsuki
title: Art of Lacquerwater: Yayoi Nanatsuki
desc: "If my skill can reach that apex, I am sure that my lacquerware will bear out the pattern of the truth..."

skills.desc: When playing an Artifact card: Spend 1 fewer Elemental Die. If two of your characters on the field already have an equipped Artifact, you additionally spend 1 fewer Elemental Die (Once per Round).
